text: David Goffin was the defending champion, but he participated in Davis Cup instead this year. Pablo Carreño Busta won the title, defeating Radu Albot in the final, 6–4, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Poznan Open - Singles 2015 Singles
title: 2015 Poznań Open – Singles
